task_description:
# Complete Profile Editing

Enable users to fully edit their profile including bio, occupation, skills, interests, and social links. Currently profile editing is partially implemented and needs completion.

## Rationale
Users cannot present themselves professionally without complete profile editing. This is a basic expectation and blocks effective networking - users need to showcase their skills and interests to find relevant connections.

## User Stories
- As a community member, I want to update my bio so that other members understand who I am
- As a startup founder, I want to add my company and role so potential collaborators can find me
- As a developer, I want to link my GitHub profile so others can see my work

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can edit their display name and bio
- [ ] Users can update their occupation and company
- [ ] Users can add/remove skills and interests tags
- [ ] Users can link social profiles (LinkedIn, GitHub, Telegram)
- [ ] Profile changes persist to Supabase database
- [ ] Form validates input and shows appropriate errors
- [ ] Profile photo can be updated via Telegram avatar sync
